title: Brooklyn Beckham Says ‘I Do Not Want to Reconcile’ With Parents David and Victoria in Lengthy Statement About Family Feud: ‘I Have Been Controlled’ for ‘Most of My Life’
summary: The Beckham family feud has boiled over from tabloid fascination to a burning Hollywood scandal. Brooklyn Beckham released a lengthy statement to his Instagram Stories on Monday morning, accusing his parents, David and Victoria, of trying to “control the narratives” around his life and “trying endl…

title: Many high-capacity NVMe SSDs are now as expensive as gold by weight as shortage intensifies — we ran the numbers, here's what we found
summary: High-capacity NVMe SSDs are quickly becoming pricier than their gold weight
